name: Fatal Twelve
description: Shishimai Rinka was a high schooler who ran a small caf√© named Lion House in place of her grandmother. She lived her life much like any other person her age, but one day, she was caught up in an explosion while returning home on the train alongside her friend, Hitsuji Naomi.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32/64-bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1280 x 720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space
